name: pyshelf
tagline: A lightweight self-hosted manager for ebooks and documents
description: pyShelf is a lightweight self-hosted media management tool designed for organizing ebooks and publications. It allows browsing and downloading through a simple web UI.

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Browse your library through a clean, responsive web interface

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find books quickly using search across titles, authors, and descriptions

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Download books directly through the web interface for offline reading

features.title: Collection Management
features.description: Organize books into collections, series, and custom categories
